skillTree.name: Fuelled by Blood
skillTree.description: Even when not feasting, the Beastmen taste blood on their lips, smell it on their fur, and want for more.

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: Gouge-Tusks
skillTree.description: The Beastman's tusks are drenched in gore - blood and sinew from every foul battle.

skillTree.name: Gnarled Hide
skillTree.description: Fur-clad, matted with offal and detritus, their weathered hides are a foul carapace.

skillTree.name: Barbed-Knuckle Boxing
skillTree.description: A brutally simple weapon makes the Doombullâ€™s incredible punching power more than enough to puncture armour and cause dreadful injury.

skillTree.name: Uncanny Senses
skillTree.description: He knows. Nobody knows how, but he does. He has always just known.

skillTree.name: Shadow Hide
skillTree.description: Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Bullish Mettle
skillTree.description: All horned Fathers of Rage encapsulate the raw will of the Dark Masters â€“ they are strong, determined, and incredibly hard to kill.

skillTree.name: Herdlord
skillTree.description: Though no master of strategy or battle doctrine, a Doombull is still capable of leadership, particularly over their own kin.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Minotaur units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Orgy of Slaughter
skillTree.description: To lead a horned armyâ€™s charge is to gore the first foe, then immediately seek to maim all others with an axeâ€™s reach.

skillTree.name: Bloodcaller
skillTree.description: The bellowing call of the Doombull resounds for miles around, invoking the intense bloodlust that runs through all their kind.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Minotaur units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Primeval Rage
skillTree.description: With a base howl, the beast radiates strength and power, a warning to his enemies that death is coming.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Primal Instincts
skillTree.description: The desire to wreak havoc is innate, brought about not by choice but by sheer force of being.

skillTree.name: Hatred of Man
skillTree.description: The Beastman's fury stretches back before most can remember - they pursue their hatred with single-minded zeal.

skillTree.name: Banquet of Flesh
skillTree.description: The stench of raw, rotten meat causes others to balk, but the warherd revels in the flesh and brawn.

skillTree.name: Savage Beast
skillTree.description: A snorting, hulking mass of blood-matted, mud-encrusted, sanguine-soaked fur - the Beastman is a terror to all.

skillTree.name: Unnatural Thirst
skillTree.description: It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Prized Horns
skillTree.description: He who locks horns with this master of the warherd does so at his own peril.

skillTree.name: Presence of Morrslieb
skillTree.description: The great green orb hangs ominously in the sky above, its followers driven to acts of madness and depravity.

skillTree.name: Fury of the Herd
skillTree.description: A summons to war in which all are drawn into the cacophonous charge; glory or sanguine death is the prize.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Ungor Spearmen Herd, Ungor Herd, Gor Herd, and Bestigor Herd units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 for Ungor Spearmen Herd, Ungor Herd, Gor Herd, and Bestigor Herd units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Ungor Spearmen Herd, Ungor Herd, Gor Herd, and Bestigor Herd units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +8 for Ungor Spearmen Herd, Ungor Herd, Gor Herd, and Bestigor Herd units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Ungor Spearmen Herd, Ungor Herd, Gor Herd, and Bestigor Herd units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Leader of the Raucous Host
skillTree.description: At the head of the warherd, he whips his followers into a frothing furore, then unleashes them upon the enemy.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Tuskgor Chariots, and Razorgor Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Tuskgor Chariots, and Razorgor Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Tuskgor Chariots, and Razorgor Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Tuskgor Chariots, and Razorgor Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Tuskgor Chariots, and Razorgor Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Tuskgor Chariots, and Razorgor Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Tuskgor Chariots, and Razorgor Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beastlordâ€™s Spite
skillTree.description: The Beastlord truly has no mercy â€“ those who flee will soon find all paths lead to a brutal end by arrow or axe.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes), and Cygor units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes), and Cygor units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes), and Cygor units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +5% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes), and Cygor units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes), and Cygor units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes), and Cygor units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes), and Cygor units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beastlord's Lash
skillTree.description: No beast can truly be controlled, but these desperate contrivances bring the smallest semblance of order.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Chaos Warhounds, Razorgor Herd, and Harpies units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Chaos Warhounds, Razorgor Herd, and Harpies units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Chaos Warhounds, Razorgor Herd, and Harpies units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Chaos Warhounds, Razorgor Herd, and Harpies units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Chaos Warhounds, Razorgor Herd, and Harpies units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hoofed Heavyweights
skillTree.description: These colossal, brutish warriors are the core of any true brayherd.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Minotaurs units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Minotaurs units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Minotaurs units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Minotaurs units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Minotaurs units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Freakish Mutations
skillTree.description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Chaos Spawn, Giant, Jabberslythe, and Ghorgon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Chaos Spawn, Giant, Jabberslythe, and Ghorgon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Chaos Spawn, Giant, Jabberslythe, and Ghorgon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Chaos Spawn, Giant, Jabberslythe, and Ghorgon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Spawn, Giant, Jabberslythe, and Ghorgon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Call of Violence
skillTree.description: "We feel it. We all feel it. The pull to war. The tug of battle. The NEED to kill."

skillTree.name: Unrelenting Savagery
skillTree.description: The Beastman delights in constant fighting; in vicious, ceaseless brutality. It gives him purpose.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 15% for Ungor Spearmen Herd, Ungor Herd, Gor Herd, and Bestigor Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Ungor Spearmen Herd, Ungor Herd, Gor Herd, and Bestigor Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Ungor Spearmen Herd, Ungor Herd, Gor Herd, and Bestigor Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Creatures of the Herd
skillTree.description: The Beastmenâ€™s elite menagerie â€“ the brayherds â€“ slaughter all those caught in their savage, animalistic sights.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Razorgor Herd, Razorgor Chariot, Tuskgor Chariot, Chaos Warhounds, and Harpies units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Razorgor Herd, Razorgor Chariot, Tuskgor Chariot, Chaos Warhounds, and Harpies units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Razorgor Herd, Razorgor Chariot, Tuskgor Chariot, Chaos Warhounds, and Harpies units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bestial Butchers
skillTree.description: Only a select few from a herd gain their Beastlord's acknowledgement â€“ a prize earned through the carnage and chaos they spread in battle.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Chaos Spawn, Minotaurs, Giant, Jabberslythe, and Ghorgon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Spawn, Minotaurs, Giant, Jabberslythe, and Ghorgon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Spawn, Minotaurs, Giant, Jabberslythe, and Ghorgon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mage Hunter
skillTree.description: The stench of magic is palpable. No mage can stand in the midst of battle against the baying warherds.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +10% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes), and Cygor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes) and Cygor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes), and Cygor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Apocalyptic Vision
skillTree.description: In fitful dreams, he sees the end. The world collapsing in on itself, leaving nothing but ashes and aberration.

skillTree.name: Gargantuan Hooves
skillTree.description: The ground shakes. The earth moves. The spirit trembles. The Beastman comes.

skillTree.name: Feasting Upon Man
skillTree.description: For those who face the warherd, a fate worse than death awaits their salivating jaws and unremitting bloodlust.

skillTree.name: Blessed by Evil
skillTree.description: Unknowingly, the Beastmen serve their dark and Ruinous Gods, who in turn bless their every action.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +30%

skillTree.name: Dark Apothecary
skillTree.description: The Dark Apothecaries mix their fell unguents, ensuring those that can continue to serve.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for Lords
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.name: Gathering of Beasts
skillTree.description: When the warherd gathers, there is much feasting, debauchery, and revelling in mania and depravity.

skillTree.name: Foul Premonitions
skillTree.description: Brought into this world by the cataclysm of Chaos, Beastmen are the very image of a dread future.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +15%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +25%

skillTree.name: Children of Chaos
skillTree.description: They bray beneath the weird, green moon, and do their perverse, grim butchery in the name of the heretical Gods.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Booze Cravings
backgroundSkills.description: Some beings just don't know when to put the bottle down.

backgroundSkills.name: Khorne's Fury
backgroundSkills.description: More than mere bloodlust, this one is filled with the primal, Ruinous rage of the Lord of Battle.

backgroundSkills.name: Nurgle's Foul Stink
backgroundSkills.description: This one has something of the compost heap about themâ€¦

backgroundSkills.name: Torment Utterances
backgroundSkills.description: The Dark Tongue is an apt medium through which to torment, mock and enrage the foe.

backgroundSkills.name: Unsated Bloodthirst
backgroundSkills.description: Sometimes, letting so much blood that the soil itself is stained just isn't enough. And it will never be.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Minotaur units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
